channel.title: Adding pure command on quest tab[Delta]
channel.description:
Hi i was wondering if anyone can tell me how to add a pure command to the quest tab. If you still dont get what im getting at its basically click the text Pure Command and u become a pure :P
So if anyone can help out that would be great and btw its a 317 :P

item.title: Adding pure command on quest tab[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

That verry easy, just click any quest line in quest tab and see the actionbutton ID in CMD, then in the clickbutton class(or whatever it is in your source) add:

case ####:
(Yourcommand (without the start command line))
break;

Replace the #### with the action button ID.

If you donâ€™t understand add me on msn: pins@jvmwebclient.com

Read full topic
